definition: a small flat triangular bone in front of the knee that protects the knee joint, to shoot in the kneecap, often done by terrorist groups as a warning
details:
noun
- a small flat triangular bone in front of the knee that protects the knee joint
= synonyms: patella
verb
- to shoot in the kneecap, often done by terrorist groups as a warning
= example: to shoot in the kneecap, often done by terrorist groups as a warning
